name: Mars Rescue Mission
description:
Heavily inspired by Alien: Isolation gameplay and Portal mechanics.

Mars Rescue Mission is a first person, puzzle exploration game with heavy storytelling.

You are sent to Mars on a mission to repair the Mars Base Satellite and embark on a journey to discover what happened to the Core Mars Colonisation team when the communications were lost. Because you are the only person for months away, it is up to you and your metal companion to find out what happened and to find any survivors.
